"Class Level Up & Equipment Sets":
"Class Level Up & Equipment Sets are items that allow you to instantly level up your favorite Class to a particular level, while simultaneously outfitting them with level-appropriate equipment.

※Level will not change if it is above the target level.
※Can only be used once per Class per character.
※After use, your Main Class will be set to the chosen Class.
※Weapons and armor will be sent to System Storage."
"Class Level Up & Equipment Sets can be used from the Class Counter by selecting the <yellow>Gameplay Skip<pict 4space><pict Arcscash><c> option."
